active_incidents.title: Some users may be experiencing issues with loading Slack.

notes.body: While we have seen some signs of improvement, we’re still investigating the issue and don’t have any new information to share at this time. We’ll be back with another update in 30 minutes.
We’re seeing signs of improvement with Slack loading as expected, but we’re still monitoring the situation. We’ll be back with another update as soon as the issue is confirmed to be fully resolved.
Some users may be having trouble with loading Slack, including threads. We are sorry for this inconvenience and are actively investigating. We will continue to share more details as we know more.
Some users may be experiencing connectivity issues. We're investigating and will provide an update as soon as we have more
